control_attributes.Control: CA-3 (1) UNCLASSIFIED NATIONAL SECURITY SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization prohibits the direct connection of an [Assignment: organization-defined unclassified, national security system] to an external network without the use of [Assignment: organization-defined boundary protection device].

Control Statement: The organization prohibits the direct connection of an [Assignment: organization-defined unclassified, national security system] to an external network without the use of [Assignment: organization-defined boundary protection device].
Control Name: CA-3 (1) UNCLASSIFIED NATIONAL SECURITY SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
